001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.res.Resources;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.View;
007import android.view.ViewGroup;
008import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
009import android.widget.ImageView;
010import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
011import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.ItemGuessesBinding;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Guess;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.function.Function;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019import java.util.stream.IntStream;
020import java.util.stream.Stream;
021
022public class GuessesAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<Guess> {
023
024  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
025  private final Map<Integer, String> colorNameLookup;
026  private final Map<Integer, Integer> colorValueLookup;
027
028  public GuessesAdapter(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull List<Guess> guesses,
029      Map<Integer, String> colorNameLookup, Map<Integer, Integer> colorValueLookup) {
030    super(context, R.layout.item_guesses, guesses);
031    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
032    this.colorNameLookup = colorNameLookup;
033    this.colorValueLookup = colorValueLookup;
034  }
035
036  @NonNull
037  @Override
038  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
039    ItemGuessesBinding binding = (convertView == null)
040        ? ItemGuessesBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false)
041        : ItemGuessesBinding.bind(convertView);
042    
043    binding.guess.removeAllViews();
044    Guess guess = getItem(position);
045    guess.getContent()
046        .codePoints()
047            .forEach((codePoint) -> {
048              ImageView swatch =
049                  (ImageView) inflater.inflate(R.layout.item_guess_chars, binding.guess, false);
050              swatch.setContentDescription(colorNameLookup.get(codePoint));
051              //noinspection DataFlowIssue
052              swatch.setColorFilter(colorValueLookup.get(codePoint));
053              binding.guess.addView(swatch);
054            });
055
056    binding.correct.setText(String.valueOf(guess.getCorrect()));
057    binding.close.setText(String.valueOf(guess.getClose()));
058
059    return binding.getRoot();
060  }
061}
